setup.question: What was the blue spectral vehicle Dan acquired?

Text.text:
who's Dan? what is this blue spectral vehicle? ev that its an inter-dimensional cage? 
ev that its not a time machine?

Dan is art enjoyer but fascinated by time machines and he really wants one. There's been a lot of art being stolen so he convinces one of the last curators that hasn't been robbed to employ him inside the museum. (he deduces that the only way for the art thieves to get inside is via a time machine) His real goal is to watch the thieves and have them take him along in the time machine. After a scuffle with the thieves he wrestles control of the blue spectral vehicle and uses it (still thinking it is a time machine) reaches the home base of the thieves.

leader of the group telling Dan what it is:

More ev about the leaderofthegroup aka The Vorplicher asks Dan to get him a time machine because he is intrigued by the concept. Dan uses the blue cage to escape again and  he gets caught by the inter-dimensional monitor service
need more ev that its an inter-dimensional cage. its not believed to be a time machine but idk if thats true by the end of the story.

okay heres ev adelle: The carrier returns here automatically when the charge drops below a critical value," the voice said. "A necessary measure to discourage big ideas on the part of wisenheimers in my employ. May I ask how you happen to be aboard the carrier, by the way?"

I don't quite dig the significance of the term."

"That thing," Dan jabbed a thumb toward the cage. "The machine I came here in. You want me-"

"Time machine," the voice repeated. "Some sort of chronometer, perhaps?"

"Huh?"

"I pride myself on my command of the local idiom, yet I confess the implied concept snows me." The nine-fingered hands folded on the desk. The beachball head leaned forward interestedly. "Clue me, Dan. What's a time machine?"

"Well, it's what you use to travel through time."

The brown eyes blinked in agitated alternation. "Apparently I've loused up my investigation of the local cultural background. I had no idea you were capable of that sort of thing." The immense head leaned back, the wide mouth opening and closing rapidly. "And to think I've been spinning my wheels collecting primitive 2-D art!"

"But-don't you have a time machine? I mean, isn't that one?"

"That? That's merely a carrier. Now tell me more about your time machines. A fascinating concept

He's part of the inter-demensional monitor service so yeah I guess he also has a vehicle. But dan was in the vehicle before being forced out:

Basically Dan heard a siren while he was in the carrier, was forced to land. And then a "irridescent rectangle" meaning another carrier appeared with Dzhackoon stepping out. 

Point im trying to make is this guy only shows up in the last 10 lines of the story. I can cite you how the story just abruptly ends after Dzhackoon introduces himself.
